original_text: The Lord says, ‘It will be very bad for you, my children who have turned against me. You have decided what to do, but you did not ask me about it. You have made an agreement with Egypt, but without my Spirit's help. In that way, you continue to do more and more sins.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 패역한 자식들은 화 있을진저 그들이 계교를 베푸나 나로 말미암지 아니하며 맹약을 맺으나 나의 영으로 말미암지 아니하고 죄에 죄를 더하도다

sentences.original_text: 'It will be very bad for you
my children who have turned against me
You have decided what to do
but you did not ask me about it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것에 대해 나에게 묻지 않았다

sentences.original_text: You have made an agreement with Egypt
you continue to do more and more sins
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 점점 더 많은 죄를 짓고 있다
